long_description: The AC-Bivy from MSR is a super lightweight waterproof, breathable bivy that provides an all-condition refuge. Minimalists can have full-on, durable protection for a mere pound! Top material uses a waterproof, breathable coating bonded to a tough yet lightweight ripstop nylon. Durashield(TM) polyurethane coating provides incredible waterproofness on the exceptionally durable nylon floor. Factory tape seam sealing provides absolute in waterproofness and out-of-the-store readiness. Envelope-style opening overlaps to provide a lightweight and simple entry; zippered mesh panel at the top end provides insect protection. 3D footbox provides ample room for campers with large feet, and comfort for everyone. Stash up to a medium-size pack in the hood area while you are inside; opening is situated to fit where your face is with the pack at the head for easy access. AC-Bivy fits you, your sleeping bag/pad and your pack!
short_description: The AC-Bivy from MSR is a super lightweight waterproof, breathable bivy that provides an all-condition refuge. Minimalists can have full-on, durable protection for a mere pound!
